title: Discover
desc: Are you looking for a refined experience for yourself? Or are you trying to find a special gift for someone else? Or perhaps you are holidaying in the area and want to splash out on a truly unique experience? Here you will be able to easily browse and compare experiences from the best luxury hotels in the world.

title: Book
desc: Using Hotel Treats you can buy the Treats you like online instantly. You, or the person you are buying a gift for, will receive a voucher which can be printed, or presented to the hotel in a digital format, on your phone or tablet.

title: Pay Securely
desc: In order to protect your personal information, Hotel Treats uses an online payment technology designed for secure transactions and anti-fraud protection.

title: Give as a Gift
desc: Every experience at Hotel Treats can be purchased as a gift. Simply select the option BUY AS A GIFT, choose the design of the voucher and write a personalized gift message. Once the purchase is completed, you will instantly receive the gift voucher in your email and be able to print it and give it to its lucky recipient!
